content:
Hi Everyone, I am new here, excuse me if this is the wrong place to ask. I have an issue with getting simd intrinsics written in rust to compile to WebAssembly (using wasm-pack or cargo directly). I described it in detail here ` https://stackoverflow.com/questions/62120638/enabling-target-feature-gated-language-features-when-using-wasm32-simd-intrinsic
Could someone help me understand why my code is not working?
You will need to recompile libcore with target_feature=simd128 enabled.
Thanks, have been trying to compile libcore with that enabled but am getting various errors. Is there a tracking issue for simd128?
